name: Rifle
visualDescription: A long, wooden rifle. You don't know enough to say more about it.

name: Gold Bar
visualDescription: Solid gold is heavy and this is a lot of it. There is a trident stamped into the side.
locationDescription: There is a gold bar here. A big one.

name: Sand
locationDescription: There is a little pile of sand here.

name: Oar
visualDescription: A wooden oar that has been worn smooth and shiny from use.
locationDescription: There is an oar sitting next to you.

name: Paper
visualDescription: A blank sheet of paper. It would be perfect for drawing a map on.
locationDescription: There is a rolled up piece of paper here.

name: Pencil
visualDescription: A well-used pencil. You will have to be thoughtful and conserve it.

name: Coconut
locationDescription: There is a coconut half buried here.

name: Fern
visualDescription: The ferns are oozing a clear, sticky substance.

name: Vine
visualDescription: Some long, thin vines that curl around the trees in the jungle. They are dark green and shine in the sunlight.

name: Flint
visualDescription: A smooth, black stone with jagged edges that reflect the sunlight.

name: Water
visualDescription: The water is clear and looks refreshing.

name: Cloth
visualDescription: It appears to be a piece of an old ship mast.
locationDescription: There is some tattered cloth here.
